Description:
HUGE PRICE REDUCTION!! - WAREHOUSE SHELL IN THE HEART OF CLIFTON HILL
Part of the landmark Staggs Gloves factory, this spacious warehouse space offers an exciting opportunity for value-adding renovation in a sought-after precinct close to Yarra Parklands, Clifton Hill Station and Queens Parade cafes. The current fit out consists of lower level with generous living and dining area with open timber-finished kitchen; additional living space is provided by a courtyard with roller-door car access from Spensley Street. Also on the ground floor are a laundry and powder room. Upstairs are two large loft-style bedrooms and a bathroom. This distinctive property features timber, mellow brick and wrought iron finishes, and the original industrial windows ensure year-round natural light. Donâ€™t miss it!
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
Enchanting Edwardian with Dual Frontage
Dual frontage with Clifton Avenue provides another desirable dimension to this fabulous freestanding Edwardian defined by excellent period appeal, modern comfort and exceptional future potential. This solid red brick, single-storey home with side ROW and sizable, sun-filled rear garden is superbly situated in a coveted village location close to Darling Gardens and Yarra parklands, cafes, shops, schools and Clifton Hill station. A traditional facade reveals a bright interior upon glossy Kauri pine floorboards that flows from two double bedrooms (open fireplace, built-in-robe) to stylish living room (open fireplace), updated kitchen with la Germania appliances, dining room and bathroom. Including alarm, panel heating, classical ceilings and leadlight; scope exists to further improve considering second level with potential city views.
Stefan Dzanovski : 0404 828 723

Description:
Versatile Warehouse Style
Freedom and flexibility underline the fabulous lifestyle allure of this brilliant warehouse conversion tucked away at the relaxing river end of the village. Polished recycled hardwood floors and clean-lined walls frame stylish contemporary spaces extending over multiple levels that are secured by alarm system, controlled by reverse-cycle heating/cooling and cleaned by ducted vacuum! Opening to a secluded, sun-drenched entertainment terrace; a superbly-proportioned floorplan includes two light and airy bedrooms with built-in-robes, versatile office/lounge or third bedroom, fitted study, large lined attic area, living/dining room, Smeg-appointed stone kitchen, two bathrooms and laundry, plus remote-control garage. Wander to Yarra trails, cafes and train station.
Vincent Taylor : 0417 586 271

Description:
Classic Appeal With A Modern Touch
Perfectly polished, this classic, single fronted Victorian terrace displays a splendid restoration with warm and inviting period charm. Updated with contemporary flair, this 2 bedroom (with fireplaces in each) home showcases gleaming polished timber floors and high ceilings throughout, defined separate living and dining zones, well equipped modern kitchen with granite bench tops & stainless steel appliances, chic bathroom, private rear courtyard and single car accommodation with easy access from the laneway.
Providing a wonderful opportunity for a secure future to professionals and investors alike, this character rich home also offers ample off street parking, ducted heating and alarm system all within walking distance to Clifton Hill station, Darling Gardens, Collingwood Leisure Centre and an array of shops, cafes and restaurants.
ALL REASONABLE OFFERS WILL BE CONSIDERED.

Description:
HIGHLY SOUGHT AFTER AND TIGHTLY HELD APARTMENT, 80SQM APPROX!
A rare find: Overlooking Ramsden Reserve!
- Two large bedrooms - both with built-in robes
- Generous open plan living and dining area - reverse cycle air conditioning (heating/cooling)
- Fantastic entertainers balcony with amazing views of parkland
- Modern kitchen; gas hotplates; dishwasher; Blanco appliances
- Central bathroom - bath; European laundry
- Secure undercover off-street carspace via remote roller door
- Sensational communal facilities including huge pool, golfing practice, and manicured gardens with dedicated landscaper
- Secure entrance via intercom
- Owner's Corporation $500 per quarter approximately
Truly a gem of a property, and a rare opportunity to secure either an outstanding first home or solid investment! Moments from Yarra trails, public transport, Dight Falls and parklands.
**PLEASE CONFIRM TIME ON DAY OF OPEN ON INTERNET**

Description:
THE ONE YOU'VE BEEN WAITING FOR!
This inviting Edwardian residence (ca 1910) typifies the perennial charm of Clifton Hill. At the prized city end of Noone Street, just minutes from the CBD, it has been tastefully renovated to offer three light-filled bedrooms, a spacious living room and a delightful outdoor entertaining area. The red brick faÃ§ade, with metal window canopy and fretwork-arched verandah, ensures immediate street appeal. Entry is to a wide hallway, floored in Baltic pine, opening to two double bedrooms (both with quality built-in wardrobes) and a smaller third bedroom. The main bedroom, like the well-proportioned living room in the centre of the house, features elegant Art Nouveau cornices and picture rails. Opening from the living room is a bright kitchen and meals area, with stainless steel appliances, timber-finished cabinets and the original pine lining boards. Set to the rear of the house, the bright bathroom is fitted with modern laundry facilities. The large rear courtyard, shaded by a mature fig tree, has recently been paved and landscaped. It includes a second WC and large shed with rear access. Fittings include gas and panel heating, split-system air conditioning, quality carpets and plantation shutters.
With all the amenities of Village living - nearby parkland, cafes and primary schools - here is a property which offers tasteful and comfortable living now, with exciting potential for extension in the future (STCA).
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
Double-Fronted Designer Dimensions!
More like a double-fronted indoor/outdoor lifestyle oasis; a deeper block, a better renovation and bigger living spaces you simply will not find so close to Yarra Bend parklands than with this stunning four bedroom, three bathroom Edwardian! Perfectly sited on an extra deep 420sqm allotment (approx) with professionally landscaped gardens and rear access, this substantial two-level home is completely transformed in sublime classical/contemporary style for flawless modern light-filled living and entertaining. Hydronic heating, air-conditioning and video intercom complement a huge floorplan featuring stylish lounge room, cathedral ceiling dining flowing to full-width living area opening to alfresco deck, solid marble Smeg-equipped chef's kitchen and stainless-steel laundry. Also offers polished floorboards, retractable awning and raintank close to cafÃ©s, shops, schools and public transport.

Description:
"Orphir"
Hidden behind the classic facade you will discover an upstairs with master bedroom or retreat enjoying panoramic city skyline views. This is the single fronted Victorian that offers so much more! Move straight in and enjoy, or take advantage of the design opportunities to make a very special home even more remarkable. Bright and spacious accommodation comprises downstairs: arched entry hall, double bedroom, two inter-linked living rooms and well-appointed kitchen over-looking the sunny
paved courtyard, and upstairs: sparkling bathroom and master bedroom affording sweeping city views. Further features include open fireplace with ornate mantle-piece and other period details, warm polished oak timber floors and rear right-of-way.

Description:
Delightful Living, Desirable Location!
Relaxed, easy inner-city living is captured with a complete commitment to comfort and convenience in this attractive terrace blending period and modern styles in a fabulous light-filled setting. A popular lifestyle position near Yarra parklands, cafes, shopping strips, trains and the CBD provides the perfect backdrop to this delightful Victorian that's previously renovated and ready for immediate enjoyment. Offers two double bedrooms with built-in robes, formal dining room (potential third bedroom or study), glorious living/meals area overlooking secluded courtyard garden with fountain, well-appointed gourmet kitchen with European appliances, lovely bathroom and laundry area, reverse cycle air-conditioning and heating. A fantastic opportunity in a quiet location flanked by landscaped garden and rear ROW.

Description:
Quiet, Convenience & Captivating Style!
In one of the inner-city's most popular pockets easily accessing a range of restaurant and retail strips, an impressive mix of classical and contemporary styles provide this brilliant Hawthorn brick Victorian with unique character, a quiet ambience and consummate comfort. Open at the rear for secluded indoor/outdoor living and entertaining, this stylish single-level cottage includes a versatile attic space that's lined and Velux skylit for multiple purposes to enhance a functional two double bedroom (built-in-robes) floorplan. Other attributes include arched hallway, stainless-steel gourmet kitchen, smart central bathroom, European laundry, north-facing light court, split-system cooling/heating, polished floorboards, covered alfresco area, courtyard garden and ROW. Stroll to transport, Darling Gardens, Fitzroy Pool and schools.

Description:
DEEPER THAN MOST
This renovated Victorian terrace radiates perennial appeal! Situated on a particularly deep allotment of 43m (142â€™), with a classic lace-trimmed verandah and smartly painted faÃ§ade, this ideally located home is set back from the street behind a neat picket fence. Two or three bedrooms (the main overlooking a side courtyard), lead off the arched hallway before it opens out into a timber-floored informal living area and smart new kitchen with stone benchtops and stainless steel appliances. A glass-walled passage to the rear leads to a good-sized tiled bathroom and a study. The prized north-facing paved courtyard gives access to a full sized laundry. A substantial brick garage opens to a right of way. With potential for extension (STCA), this attractive property featuring period detail and ample storage is superbly situated close to Yarra parkland, Spensley Street Primary and Village cafes.
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
'Roseneath' c1910
There's a sense of something special with 'Roseneath', a classic tuckpointed solid brick Edwardian that stands elevated on a sizable north-facing rear corner block in a popular village position. Completely comfortable inviting immediate enjoyment; its large proportions, period appeal and perfect orientation provide enormous inspiration to further improve and create a grand inner-city home that's conveniently nestled near Darling Gardens and Yarra parkland trails, cafes, shops, trains, schools and the CBD. A wide arched hallway leads to two generous bedrooms, large living room with box bay window, formal dining room, spacious kitchen and meals area, panelled bathroom, laundry and sunny paved backyard with off-street parking. Also features high ceilings, open fireplaces and gas heating. This original 'Roseneath' c1910 is ready to enjoy now, rejuvenate or renovate.

Description:
Parkland Position for Big Ideas
This unique property is a rare blank canvas that's big and broad awaiting bold ideas to fill the space and create a contemporary Clifton Hill masterpiece! Nestled in a prized parkland pocket, this long-held family Victorian sited to the front of a large 465m2 allotment (approx) features sun-filled backyard and superb ROW. Renovators will rejoice with the rewards of their hard work while innovators will relish the opportunity to design an inner-city domain of distinction (STCA) in this highly-coveted position just moments to river trails, parks, school, cafes, shops and trains. Presenting good proportions and plenty of scope, this double block-fronted residence currently offers fretted hallway, three bedrooms, living room, dining room, timber kitchen, central bathroom, store rooms, gas heating, Baltic pine floors, open fireplaces and garaging.

Description:
Price Reduced!
Move straight in and enjoy or add further value with an easy refurbishment - the choice is yours. This bright and spacious strata apartment comprises living/dining room, separate kitchen, bathroom and two bedrooms, BIR's, plus undercover parking! You will also love the location. With hundreds of acres of parkland right across the road you can stroll to the Fairfield Boat House and Children's Farm or take advantage of the network of bike paths. Investors or first home buyers looking for an inner city address at an affordable price must consider!

Description:
Designer Style, City Views!
A spectacular rooftop terrace overlooking the CBD skyline is the perfect position for privacy and entertainment adding a unique edge to this brilliant Hawthorn brick terrace on a coveted one-way village street. Innovative architect enhancement has created a stunning inner-city home featuring a three bedroom floorplan and versatile upstairs studio just moments to parklands, trails, cafes and transport. Striking design elements and quality features including hydronic heating, air-conditioning, clever storage, double arched hall, polished timber/concrete floors, auto security shutters, light court and attic complement stylish central bath and powder rooms, laundry, Miele-appointed stone kitchen, spacious open-plan living/dining (Nectre heater) with bifold doors opening to courtyard garden and easy rear off street parking access via auto door.

Description:
Captivating Village Class
All your inner-city lifestyle needs are met with maximum comfort and minimum effort in this excellent freestanding contemporary residence nestled at the heart of the Clifton Hill village. Classical inspiration merges with modern quality and convenience as this immaculately presented home affords superb light-filled living throughout a flexible floorplan flowing to a private Tuscan-style entertainers' courtyard garden and secure remote-control off street parking. Just metres to cafes, shops, train station, Darling Gardens and school; a secluded north-facing alfresco deck precedes a beautiful, high-ceiling interior featuring three sizable bedrooms (main with ensuite, upstairs built-in-robes and balconies) or two and study, open-plan living/dining room, fabulous kitchen with European appliances and water filter, main bathroom, concealed laundry, good storage, ducted heating, air-conditioning, alarm and polished floorboards.

Description:
Price Reduced to $780,000
Should we sell or keep it? Your last opportunity to stake a claim to this stunning inner city residence providing versatile accommodation
over three levels, punctuated by magnificent city sky line views.
The value packed floor plan gives you two spacious light-filled living areas (with two terraces on the upper level), three bedrooms (main with ensuite and walk in robe) and two car auto garage. Professionals seeking a home office please note!
Further features include stone finishes, European appliances, alarm system, video intercom, panel heating, air-conditioning and hardwood floors. Close to Yarra Bend parkland, trails, train station and cafes.
Priced to sell, call for an appointment or inspect this weekend!
